bug.short_desc: Dynamic theme change does not properly change the row styles in a table

long_desc.thetext:
In the showcase demo there exist a table demo and a theme change demo. If the theme is changed from default to Ext the table rows of the table demo sometimes switches between the default and the Ext theme.
To reproduce please open the showcase demo on
http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/showcase/#Themes
then open the theming window by clicking the button "Open theming window". After the themeing window is open change to the Table by clicking the icon "Table". Now scroll down and up a few times the table content.
Now change the theme to ext by clicking on the button "Theme: Ext".
After this the theme changes for all widgets except the table rows. Scrolling down and up shows the rows sometimes with the default theme and sometimes with the Ext theme.
I suspect this is a caching problem where the cache is not invalidated after a theme change.
Due to the announcement of 0.7.3 I wanted to bring this bug back in mind.
Til is not actively working on qooxdoo anymore.
Theme handling will change significantly in 0.8 (e.g. come without runtime switching). Doubt this bug will be targeted any time soon, sorry.
Dynamic theme changes are not supported anymore in 0.8
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
